text:
[Verse]
Walking down the silent street
Echoes of my heartbeat
Shadows dance in the night
Stars above shining bright

[Verse 2]
Footsteps soft on cobblestone
Feeling like I'm not alone
Whispers in the cool breeze
Feel the night put me at ease

[Chorus]
Under the moonlight we go
Dreams that only we know
Holding hands in the dark
Love ignites a spark

[Verse 3]
Lost in this midnight world
Just a boy and a girl
Time slows down just for us
No need to rush no fuss

[Bridge]
Feel the magic in the air
Moments like these are rare
In the glow of moon's light
Everything feels so right

[Chorus]
Under the moonlight we go
Dreams that only we know
Holding hands in the dark
Love ignites a spark
title: Under the Moonlight
